info.title: extract-load-batch-api
info.description: The Extract and Load Batch Swagger UI provides the ability to perform API requests such as GET, POST, PUT and DELETE to all available endpoints.

post.summary: Post data source properties and add connection
post.description: Inserts new data source configuration properties and add connection.

get.summary: Get data source properties and connection status
get.description: Retrieve data source connection properties by Id.

put.summary: Update data source properties and connection
put.description: Updates data source properties and refresh connection.

delete.summary: Delete data source properties and remove connection
delete.description: Deletes data source connection properties by Id.

post.description: Inserts new table to be bundled.

get.description: Retrieve table definitions data by Id.

post.summary: Post definitions of extract and load data bundle

get.description: Retrieve data bundle definitions by Id.

delete.description: Deletes data bundle definitions by Id.

post.description: Insert new data bundle definition adding new target and source tables.

post.summary: Post extract-load data batch job execution
post.description: Start batch job execution using job parameters request for extract-load data.

get.summary: Get batch job execution status and metadata
get.description: Retrieve batch job execution status and metadata by Id.

CreatedObjectResponse.title: CreatedObjectResponse
CreatedObjectResponse.description: Body for retrieve unique identifier from created object.

sourceDataSourceId.description: Unique identifier from origin data source.

targetDataSourceId.description: Unique identifier from target data source.

DataBundleRequest.title: DataBundleRequest
DataBundleRequest.description: Body for create bundle and it's bundled tables.

sourceDataSourceId.description: Unique identifier from origin data source.

targetDataSourceId.description: Unique identifier from target data source.

bundledTables.description: List of bundled tables for extract and load data.

DataTableRequest.title: DataTableRequest
DataTableRequest.description: Body for create new table definition.

DataTableResponse.title: DataTableResponse
DataTableResponse.description: Body for retrieve unique identifier from created table definition.

createDateTime.description: ISO format date time from register creation.

updateDateTime.description: ISO format date time from last update.

DataBundleResponse.title: DataBundleResponse
DataBundleResponse.description: Bundle definitions response. Represents the data table grouping that should be extracted and loaded.

sourceDataSourceId.description: Unique identifier from origin data source.

targetDataSourceId.description: Unique identifier from target data source.

bundledTables.description: List of bundled tables for extract and load data.

DataSourcePropertiesRequest.title: DataSourcePropertiesRequest
DataSourcePropertiesRequest.description: Body for data source properties request.

createDateTime.description: ISO format date time from register creation.

updateDateTime.description: ISO format date time from last update.

JobExecutionResponse.title: JobExecutionResponse
JobExecutionResponse.description: Response from batch job execution metadata.

jobStartTime.description: ISO format job execution start date time.

jobEndTime.description: ISO format job execution end date time.

exitMessage.description: Job execution exit message. Only available when exit status represents an job execution error.

steps.description: List of batch steps executions metadata.

StepMetadataResponse.title: StepMetadataResponse
StepMetadataResponse.description: Response from batch step execution metadata.

stepStartTime.description: ISO format job execution start date time.

stepEndTime.description: ISO format job execution end date time.

commitCount.description: The number of times in which the step has committed a transaction during this execution.

readCount.description: The number of items read during this execution.

writeCount.description: The number of items written and committed during this execution.

writeSkipCount.description: The number of items skipped on write during this execution.

exitMessage.description: Step execution exit message. Only available when exit status represents an step execution error.

JobParametersRequest.title: JobParametersRequest
JobParametersRequest.description: Body for start batch job execution with parameters.

type.description: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type.  When referenced, it SHOULD provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML).

title.description: A short summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers, example: Service Unavailable.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

BundledTableRequest.title: BundledTableRequest
BundledTableRequest.description: Body for bundled table definitions request.

sourceTableId.description: Indicates table definitions unique identifier from origin data source.

targetTableId.description: Indicates table definitions unique identifier from target data source.

relationalOrdering.description: Indicates the table relational ordering from parents to it's child tables.

querySelect.description: Indicates extract data sql query (select). If it's not informed, the system will use default query.

queryInsert.description: Indicates load data sql query (insert). If it's not informed, the system will use default query.

queryUpdate.description: Indicates load data sql query (update). If it's not informed, the system will use default query.
queryUpdate.example: UPDATE DUMMY_TABLE SET DUMMY_TABLE_DESC = :DUMMY_TABLE_DESC WHERE DUMMY_TABLE_ID = :DUMMY_TABLE_ID

sourceTableId.description: Indicates table definitions unique identifier from origin data source.

targetTableId.description: Indicates table definitions unique identifier from target data source.

relationalOrdering.description: Indicates the table relational ordering from parents to it's child tables.

querySelect.description: Indicates extract data sql query (select). If it's not informed, the system will use default query.

queryInsert.description: Indicates load data sql query (insert). If it's not informed, the system will use default query.

queryUpdate.description: Indicates load data sql query (update). If it's not informed, the system will use default query.
queryUpdate.example: UPDATE DUMMY_TABLE SET DUMMY_TABLE_DESC = :DUMMY_TABLE_DESC WHERE DUMMY_TABLE_ID = :DUMMY_TABLE_ID

ExitStatusEnum.description: Job or Step execution exit status.

DatabaseProductEnum.description: Name of supported database product. It's allows application to retrieve respective jdbc driver used for connection.
